item.title: Mjordan's Account Creator[UPDATED]!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

[quote=“neontheteacher, post:46, topic:42112”]yup. i just made 5 manually, and im no geniuse but " Password = ‘password’; //The password you want all your accounts to have" you have to have diff passes on all accounts…and im sorry but this script is worthless, in the time you set it up you could have made them yourself lol[/quote]Umm lol no you don’t have to have different passwords on every account…

And it takes like 1 minute max to set it up if you know what names you want to make. Then just let it run while you go eat or something.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32”]Congratz my friend You owned all =)
IT is nice ;D

although you must change the wait time to this Wait(6500 + Random(2000));
because you know not all people have fast internet although thats nice

Thinking if there was Auto tutorial Island?
thanks[/quote]Well thank you very much man
And yeah I knew tha wait times would cause I little problem because of people’s different internet speeds. But you know what your doing, and can change them for you

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:42, topic:42112”]How do people know that Jagex only detects stuff inside the game? How do people know that Jagex pickup movements every 50 mili seconds? How do people know…?[/quote]We just know that they don’t. There would be no need in it, so don’t worry…

This was my first script, and it is from AGES ago. Since I see some interest in it again, I will update it. Once I check back in with everything and get back up to date, I will fix the script. It shouldn’t take no time at all :)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 06:45:08 PM[/size][hr]

I updated it for you guys wanting me to!
Check out the first page!

item.title: Mjordan's Account Creator[UPDATED]!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

pkeevily:

what does this do???

Well this was only my second script, and it hasn’t been updated in quite a while so its pretty rough lol. And it does exactly what it says, it creates an account for you on RS.

It doesn’t run them through tutorial island, it just creates them. I guess it wouldn’t take me no time to make a new one if some people want me to.

Read full topic
